Stun/Fascinate:Unknown Effect 128 (100)?
 
(Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], No Effect on Mindless [mind], May Use Underwater [uwok])
This is a banish spell. With this prayer the priest smites undead beings with the power of his celestial God. A large number of undead beings will take damage and stop in their tracks unless they manage to resist the banishment.
